message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. I'd be happy to pay $85 for it.
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. To better accommodate your budget, I am now offering the product for $95.
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still a little over budget at $95. Would you consider $90? This would be a fair deal for both of us.
